mapper.sql: fid, fuid, fscore, ftype, fremark, fcreatetime
mapper.insert: insert into f_log_user_score ( fid, fuid, fscore, ftype, fremark, fcreatetime ) values ( #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fscore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ftype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
